room_title: Escape room "Cabin" by The SafeHouse in Tulsa
review: Had a great time at safe house !!! It was a lot of fun Cabin has to be an all time favorite -Whitney was a great help while also letting us figure it out on our own -she was really sweet and helpful !! Five stars for the safe house

room_title: Escape room "Cabin" by The SafeHouse in Tulsa
review: The family and I were looking for an escape room to try out, and the lady at the front desk suggested the "Cabin". She said it would be a fun one to do and easy for newbies that were in our group. She was right- we all had a blast and even the little 4 year old smarty pants had a great time. He helped us find the final clue to get the last door open. Very nice, clean establishment to have an evening out for a sense of adventure and fun for an hour. Thank you again everyone at Safe House!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin" by The SafeHouse in Tulsa
review: Had a great time. The entire family (5 adults + a smart 10-year-old) participated and we beat the Cabin in 49 minutes. May not be a record but it was fun.
